name: Haunted Halloween
description:
The twins Ster and Madalena, along with their younger sister Floribela, are asking for candy from door to door in a Hallween night, when they see an enormous mansion.They knock on the door, but nobody answers. When noticing the door is unlocked, the sisters get in. Soon, the lights mysteriously go off, and the door gets locked by its own. Seconds later, the light is back, but Floribela is nowhere to be found.

As gêmeas Ster e Madalena, junto com sua irmã mais nova Floribela, estão pedindo doces de casa em casa numa noite de Hallwoeen, quando avistam uma enorme mansão. Elas batem na porta, mas ninguém responde. Ao perceberem que a porta está destrancada, as irmãs entram. Logo, as luzes misteriosamente se apagam, e a porta se fecha e se tranca sozinha. Segundos depois a luz está de volta, mas Floribela desapareceu.

Gabriella Almeida: Illustrations, User Interface, Game Design.

Leticia Dutra: 3D Art, VFX, Game Design, Programming.
